pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pallatthikāya nisinnassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.3.1: “Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.4: Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk65:1.5: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
